message.body: U goin to mikes bday party tonight?
Ugh I would but my friend's visiting and I'm in Bryn mawr with no car :( are you?
I dunno I'm in NYC not sure when I'll be back yet
Oh lol you driving?
Nah I'll take the bus. I dun have a car. #citylife
True that. I just got a bike
Yeah I really need to get one. I have terrible back problems though idk if I can ride one
Get a cruiser not a road bike so you're not hunched over
Yeah but then I look mad funny
Gotta be lookin cool while I'm cruising on my bike homey
Lol ya that is also true. I'm sure you could rock the cruiser style lol
Ppl in cars will purposely try to run me off the road Cuz I look too goofy
They'll do that anyway cause you're on a bike at all
I did this mock jury where this girl got hit and crushed by an oil tanker in south philly... made me a lil scared to bike
Omg dude why would u tell me that! What's a mock jury duty???
It wasn't a duty. It was a focus group. A NIGGA GOT PAID! Nah but it was so crazy though. Very interesting and shocking story
Haha a focus group doesn't really make me understand it more.. Wow, awesome. I'm terrified all the time
Well two lawyers presented the case to a bunch of mock jury members to practice before a real jury.
Oh sweet, ya I probs can't make it tonight :(
Yeah I might just stay in the big city anyhow
Alrighty :)
